answers.answer: Thay may ne worried baby could be to big for your body by the time you reach 40 weeks. That's a common reason why they induce women. I got induced 2 weeks early because I had gestational diabetes

Some doctors will induce you once youre full term... but, every doctor has a different definition of full term some are 37 some are 39.. and some doctors wont induce you unless you go past your due date.. it really depends on your doctor and the way they do things
Unless its an emergency that is :)
Most doctors consider induction at 39 weeks
I've had a relatively uncomplicated pregnancy and I'm getting induced on the 28th, I will be 39wks 4days so I guess it depends on the doctor

question: Do doctor's induce only for medical reasons? I'll be 37 weeks when my spring break starts and I would really love to have my baby then so I can recover during spring break and won't have to miss school. (Please don't comment if its something negative about me wanting to get induced I don't care for negative feedback and judgemental women)
title: being induced
